title: Pawnbrokers; create legacy license for certain businesses and provide for the renewal of licenses.
subject: Business and Financial Institutions

actions.description: Referred To Business and Financial Institutions
Title Suff Do Pass Comm Sub

extras.summary: AN ACT TO PROVIDE THAT PAWNBROKER BUSINESSES HOLDING A LICENSE AT THE TIME OF THE EFFECTIVE DATE OF THIS ACT SHALL BE CONSIDERED LEGACY PAWNBROKERS; TO PROVIDE THAT LEGACY PAWNBROKERS SHALL HAVE THEIR LICENSES INTERNALLY RENEWED ON AN ANNUAL BASIS WITHOUT THE NEED FOR REAPPLICATION; TO PROVIDE REQUIREMENTS FOR NEW PAWNBROKER BUSINESSES; TO PROVIDE FOR THE TRANSITION TO LEGACY STATUS FOR NEW BUSINESSES; TO REQUIRE NEW OWNERS TO APPLY FOR A NEW LICENSE UPON SALE OR TRANSFER OF A LEGACY PAWNBROKER BUSINESS; TO REQUIRE THE DEPARTMENT OF CONSUMER FINANCE TO INTERNALLY REISSUE LEGACY LICENSES WITHIN 30 BUSINESS DAYS; TO PROVIDE THAT LICENSES NOT RENEWED WITHIN THE 30-DAY TIMEFRAME SHALL AUTOMATICALLY RENEW; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
